title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that there are three isotopes represented in the mass spectrum.
The response indicates that there are three isotopes represented in the mass spectrum.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response indicates that the simple average (arithmetic mean) of the masses has to be calculated but does not include the concept of weighting the masses before adding them.

The response indicates that the weighted average must be calculated by finding the sum of three terms, each of which is the product of the proportional abundance of each isotope and the mass of each isotope

(e.g.,â€‰(0.79)(24)+(0.10)(25)+(0.11)(26), or (0.80)(24) + (0.10)(25) + (0.10)(26)) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7342@
